overview: Khajuraho is an Indian town famous for its ancient erotic rock carvings and the UNESCO‑listed group of temples that attract many foreign visitors.
idealDuration: 1–2 days to explore the main temple complex
topAttractions: Khajuraho Group of Monuments (ancient erotic rock carvings)
travelTips: Khajuraho attracts many foreign visitors, so basic tourist facilities are available.
Information on the destination may be limited; verify current details before traveling.
